comment: Has anyone brewed this? I am contemplating trying it. The IBU's listed seems low for the amount of hops called for and it's pretty much continually hopped throughout the boil. Comments are appreciated.

Hi Hophead! Sorry for the late reply. 
I brewed two batches of this beer for my wedding day. It was our give away for the guests :)
The results were varying from pretty good to some popping bottles... the overall taste was pretty good, although a bit sweet indeed.
